select l.id as id, sum(l.loanAmount) as value, SUBSTRING(l.addDate,1,10) as name,
lt.loantypename as 'group'
from loantype lt
left join t_loan l on l.status = loantypestatus
where 1=1
and l.addDate >=DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 7 DAY)
and l.addDate >=DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 15 DAY)
and l.addDate >=DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 30 DAY)
and l.addDate <= str_to_date(#{maxdate},"%Y-%m-%d")
and l.addDate >= str_to_date(#{mindate},"%Y-%m-%d")
and lt.loantypestatus = 4
group by SUBSTRING(l.addDate,1,10)
select * FROM t_tree r LEFT JOIN role_tree o on r.id = o.treeId LEFT JOIN t_role a on a.roleId = o.roleId where a.roleId = #{pid} and r.pid = #{id}
